SEARCH
Package stockhw4.view

Interface StockView

All Known Implementing Classes:
StockControllerTest.MockStockViewImpl, StockViewImpl
public interface StockView
This interface represents a StockView that defines the view operations listed below for user interface.

      Parameters:

      void getProgressBarView(int index)
      Build a progress bar, showing progress of some input percent.
      Parameters:
      index - input percent to rendered as a progress bar.

    • getNewUserView

      void getNewUserView()
      Method to load greeting and load prompt for inputting username from user.

    • getUserOptionsView

      void getUserOptionsView()
      Method to prompt an existing user to select one of 6 options. The 1st option loads a view to create a portfolio. The 2nd option loads a view to let the user view the contents of a specific portfolio. The 3rd option loads a view to calculate the total value of a portfolio. The 4th option loads a view to allow a user to dump an existing portfolio. The 5th option loads a view to allow a user to load an external portfolio. The 6th option terminates the running of the application.

    • getPortfolioCreatorView

      void getPortfolioCreatorView()
      Method for loading view to build a portfolio, one ticker at a time.

    • getPortfolioHeaderView

      void getPortfolioHeaderView()
      Method for displaying greeting before showing all portfolios to user.

    • getTotalPortfolioValueView

      void getTotalPortfolioValueView()
      Method to display total value of a portfolio belonging to a specific user.

    • terminateView

      void terminateView()
      Method to load a view that confirms if a user wishes to terminate the application.

    • getTableViewBuilder

      void getTableViewBuilder(List<String> rows, List<String> columns)
      Method to build a view that renders a table given a List of rows, and List of columns.
      Parameters:
      rows - the rows the table must render apart from the header row.
      columns - the columns that the table must render.
